title: What happens when everyone hits full mastery?
body:
Because it is just grinding, eventually everyone will gain full mastery of quite a few champs.

What then? Are we all "masters" of a huge pool of champs?

replies.body: They should have set the mastery points you get exponentially decreases as you go on, so one shall never reach full mastery, unless you've played so god dang many times as this champ that approximates it to full.

Maybe they'll change the system so you have to consistently be good with a champ. Like if you go too long without playing them or do badly then you lose Mastery points and have to keep playing as that champ. That way people who don't constantly play every champ will only have their mains "mastered".
Riot will keep upping the mastery level. Put rewards in to keep people playing ETC.

I have reached level 5 mastery with 4 champs.

I am proud of my accomplishments
